resourceInfo.description: Chromosome sequence for Leishmania tarentolae is provided by the CIHR Group on host pathogen interactions (Marc Ouellette, Jacques Corbeil, Barbara Papadopoulou, Michel J. Tremblay, Frédéric Raymond, Sébastien Boisvert from Université Laval, and Martin Olivier from McGill University). The CIHR group plans on publishing the completed and annotated sequences in a peer-reviewed journal as soon as possible. Permission should be obtained from Marc Ouellette before publishing analyses of the sequence/open reading frames/genes on a chromosome or genome scale.
The sequence source ids for L tarentolae source_ids prepended with Lt_.
